titleStmt.title: Heaven the end of man or, Final cause of the soul's spirit. By William Williams, teutonico-philosopho-theologus
titleStmt.author: Williams, William, Inferior Brother to the venerable and orthodox clergy.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Eliz. Whitlock, in Amen-Corner, near Stationers-Hall,
